greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Domination number for knights' graph on an n X n toroidal board.
comment: That is, the minimal number of knights needed to cover an n X n toroidal chessboard so that every square either has a knight on it, or is under attack by a knight, or both.
reference: John J. Watkins, Across the Board: The Mathematics of Chessboard Problem, Princeton University Press, 2004, pages 140-144.
example: For an 8 X 8 board, the solution is:
results.author: _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Dec 12 2016
